metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5208 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the wrestool program in icoutils before 0.31.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted executable, which triggers a denial of service (application crash) or the possibility of execution of arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

icoutils - 0.31.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icoutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31.1-1').
